content: The **Fourth Goh Chok Tong Cabinet** is the [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore) formed by [Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore) [Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong) following the [2001 general election](/wiki/2001_Singaporean_general_election) which governed the country until Goh was succeeded as prime minister by [Lee Hsien Loong](/wiki/Lee_Hsien_Loong) in 2004. ## Cabinet The Fourth Goh Chok Tong Cabinet is composed of the following members.
